title: One for All
body:
Hi fellow League lovers! I have been unable to get on League lately due to net issues, but I really want to play One for All! It would be amazing if we could get One for All up for an extra week. :D 
Please help me! I would greatly appreciate it. ♥{{summoner:31}}

replies.body: OFA is garbage, I cannot wait until it's gone.
Don't be like that, it's for the funs
Bro he is bipolar, he probably likes it now

> [{quoted}](name=Gravelord,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ffhUPTvk,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-10-24T09:12:16.435+0000)
>
> Bro he is bipolar, he probably likes it now

I play two games, two penta kills, ez gamemode.
Half of OCE plays this game mode for fun, the other half play serious to win. In game modes like these, Pentakills don't really mean anything.
Those people who rage at you for spamming in urf..blargh
